name: google-nnlm-models
description: Google's NNLM embeddings model words in high-dimensional space to improve semantic understanding in language tasks.

functions.name: embed_items

output.name: items
output.description: The same input items for embeddings.

functions.description: The inference function of the model.

functions.name: embed_dataset

input.name: dataset
input.description: The input dataset of the items required for prediction.

input.name: filters
input.description: The DQL in json format to get all the items required for prediction.

functions.description: Inference function of the model on a dataset.

models.name: nnlm-zh-dim50
models.description: A pre-trained model by Google that embeds Chinese words into a 50-dimensional space to enhance semantic understanding in language processing tasks.

models.name: nnlm-zh-dim128
models.description: A pre-trained model by Google that embeds Chinese words into a 128-dimensional space to enhance semantic understanding in language processing tasks.
